mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (first_name, last_name, address, zipcode) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{address}, #{zipcode});
INSERT INTO employee_phonenumbers(id_employee, phone_type, phone_number) VALUES (#{id}, #{phoneType}, #{phoneNumber});
mapper.select: SELECT first_name, last_name, address, phone_type, phone_number, zipcode FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_phonenumbers ON employees.id_employee = employee_phonenumbers.id_employee;
